document.full_text: comedian gilbert gottfried apologized on tuesday for a series of jokes made on twitter about the japanese earthquake and tsunami, comments which got him fired as the voice of insurer aflac.
document.title: fired comedian gottfried apologizes for japan jokes
lines_and_colors: comedian gilbert gottfried apologized on tuesday for a series of jokes made on twitter about the japanese earthquake and tsunami, comments which got him fired as the voice of insurer aflac.
